svg.title: The chi-Square distribution
svg.desc:
chi-square distribution f_k(x) = x^(n/2-1) * exp(-x/2) / (2^(n/2) * gamma(n/2))
from Wikimedia Commons plot-range: 0 to 8 plotted with cubic bezier-curves the bezier-controll-points are calculated to give a very accurate result. accuracy is 0.00001 units symbols in "Computer Modern" (TeX) font embedded created with a plain text editor using GNU/Linux
about: http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Image:chi-square_pdf.svg source: http://commons.wikimedia.org/ rights: GNU Free Documentation license, Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike license
